name: Blastomancer: The Puzzle Game
description:
Logical puzzle game with a fun, playful story and a unique art style to match.

DescriptionThe wicked Distortions were once thought to have been defeated for good, but their sudden invasion proves that clearly someone had it wrong. Guided by your mentor, Grandmaster Blaster Doolius Fillias, it falls to you, a student of the blasting art of Blastomancy to test your skills, use your bombs, vanquish the invading Distortions, free your world and save the day — hopefully for good this time!

Become yourself a Blastomancer in this brain-challenging logical puzzle game featuring a fun, playful story and a unique, abstract art style. Blast the wicked Distortions that are invading your Universe by using special bombs that color match your foes, meet fun characters across special worlds, and look good while you’re at it by customizing your character with heaps of cool items from the Style Shop.

Features
  •  Original concept and simple mechanics.
  •  187 challenging puzzles across 8 different worlds. 
  •  Humorous story and chill soundtrack.
  •  Unlockable customization items.
  •  3 difficulty levels.
  •  Dark mode for eye comfort.
  •  Leaderboards and Achievements.
  •  Free to Play. Daily Rewards.
  •  Progress saved using Google Play Services.
Awards
  •  Game Development World Championship 2020 - Official Highlights Selection (top 50 out of 1500+ games from all platforms)
  •  Yodo1 2021 Game Developers Competition - Runner up Best Graphics category (top 4 out of 200+ mobile games)
